Posts.Content: alvarez5 wrote: Hello, I am new on here.  I was just wondering if anyone has had localized pain in one breast that has been diagnosed with BC.  I am having a diagnostic and ultrasound in a week and a half and am really nervous.  I know that usually when it is just pain, it is nothing but I am worried.  I have had the pain for about 4 months and it is not related to hormonal changes each month.  I would appreciate any feedback.  thanks Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: worried about pain alvarez5 alvarez5

Posts.Content: Oct 19, 2011 11:56AM alvarez5 wrote: Thanks smaysings1!  It is good to know that there are other people out there that have the same issues.  I thought about the caffeine issue but I only drink like an 8oz cup of coffee a day sometimes two.  We do not drink soda.  I get frustrated because you are right.  Everyone says if you have pain then most likely you do not have cancer.  I do not trust statistics.  I guess it is because I am the one having the pain.  The waiting I think is the hardest part.  I hope everything turns out well for you as well.
Posts.Title: worried about pain alvarez5 alvarez5

Posts.Content: Oct 27, 2011 03:42PM alvarez5 wrote: So the closer I get to my US and diagnostic the more nervous I become.  I try to not think about it.  I have also not tried to read any posts or research anything because that just makes things worse.  I pray the doctors don't find anything and that the pain will just go away.  I will let everyone know when I get back on Tuesday.
Posts.Title: worried about pain alvarez5 alvarez5
